about_the_game:
As the time went on, travellers and nomads began to notice that of all the cities in the world of Pentarull, one stood out for its style and development. This is KongGong, which has become known as the centre of technology! Factories were built there, and the first mechanical devices, including weapons, were created. But it wasn't always like this. The ancient fox spirit Huli Jing once had ruled here, and with its holy power it kept peace and balance for the inhabitants of the region.

Why did people, who left magic behind, become interested in progress and improving the city? What mysteries of the new Kong-Gong will our protagonist have to learn? All this awaits you in the new addition, and your faithful companion will be a wonderful cat-detective Miyu Nekomado!

Features of Revenge of the Fox Spirit DLC:

🐉 New region with steam punk design
🐉 New monster girls with their own tragic stories
🐉 Exclusive H-scenes, erotic cards and puzzles!
🐉 New side quests
🐉 New battle cards and equipment
🐉 New Soundtrack with the East and steam punk vibes
🐉 New achievements on Steam
🐉 Unique wallpapers for desktop
🔥 THIS DLC IS MORE THAN JELLY CHRISTMAS DLC

content_descriptors.notes:
All characters in the game are adults (18+)
The game contains adult content including nudity and sex scenes, swearing and smoking scenes.

The game features nude girls, monster girls and animated porno scenes with them, also erotic cards and puzzles.

short_description: Strange disappearances of men have begun in the steampunk town of Kong-Gong, so cat detective Miyu is sent there for investigation. Here, in this unusual place, technology has begun to supplant magic, but one ancient spirit clearly doesn't like it...
supported_languages: English, Russian, Simplified Chinese, French, Portuguese - Brazil, Dutch, Polish, Spanish - Latin America, Romanian, Turkish, German, Ukrainian, Traditional Chinese, Thai, Japanese, Italian, Bulgarian
